name: Dream Dandies
description:
A parody dating sim with a luxury twist! Can you smooth talk your way into these foppish hearts?

Dream Dandies was designed to be played in front of a live audience at Amecon, but you can play along at home too! Groups make it far more fun so grab some friends and get voice acting. If you'd like to join in on the mini games you'll need two cups of tea, a selection of biscuits and some fanfiction to read out loud...

Art by Tab Kimpton, Script and Coding by Nathan Blades, play more of his games at sixofspades.itch.io
